metadata.title: CVE-2019-15585 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Improper authentication exists in < 12.3.2, < 12.2.6, and < 12.1.12 forGitLab Community Edition (CE) and Enterprise Edition (EE) in the GitLabSAML integration had a validation issue that permitted an attacker totakeover another user's account.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
